channel.title: NameQuick Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.9.14
item.description:
NameQuick v1.9.14 Release Notes

‚ö° Major Performance Boost

Lightning-Fast Image Loading

  • Instant previews - Images appear immediately and get sharper as they load, no more waiting
  • Smart loading - Only loads full quality when needed, saving time and memory
  • No more blank screens - See your images right away instead of staring at loading spinners
  • Seamless browsing - Navigate through images without delays or stuttering

Smoother Overall Experience

  • Faster app performance - Everything feels more responsive, especially with large folders
  • Better memory usage - Uses less RAM so your Mac stays fast while processing files
  • Smarter processing - Automatically adjusts to your Mac‚Äôs capabilities for optimal speed
  • Instant cancellation - Stop operations immediately when you need to

üé® Visual Improvements

Polished Animations

  • Fixed notification animations - Success and error messages now slide out smoothly instead of disappearing instantly
  • Smoother transitions - Image quality improvements happen seamlessly as you browse
  • No more freezing - Interface stays responsive even during heavy file processing

Better Responsiveness

  • Smooth scrolling - Browse through large image collections without lag
  • Quick folder loading - Opening folders with hundreds of files is now much faster
  • Instant previews - See images immediately when switching between files

üöÄ What You‚Äôll Notice

Faster Everything

  • 3x faster image loading - Large photos and screenshots appear much quicker
  • Smoother batch processing - Rename hundreds of files without the app slowing down
  • Less waiting - Operations that used to take time now happen almost instantly

More Reliable

  • Better memory management - App uses significantly less RAM, especially with large files
  • Smarter about resources - Automatically backs off when your Mac is busy with other tasks
  • No more getting stuck - Operations complete reliably and you can always cancel if needed

üõ†Ô∏è Behind the Scenes

Intelligent Optimization

  • Adapts to your Mac - Performance automatically adjusts based on your system‚Äôs current load
  • Prevents duplicate work - No more processing the same file multiple times by accident
  • Memory-friendly - Automatically frees up memory when your Mac needs it for other apps

Better File Handling

  • Smarter image caching - Keeps frequently used images ready while clearing old ones
  • Faster file operations - Reading and processing files is significantly more efficient
  • Improved error handling - Better recovery when something goes wrong

üêõ Bug Fixes

Visual Polish

  • Fixed notification dismissal animations that were instant instead of smooth
  • Improved timing of visual feedback throughout the app
  • Enhanced consistency of animations and transitions

Performance & Reliability

  • Resolved issues where the app could slow down during large batch operations
  • Fixed memory usage growing unnecessarily over time
  • Improved handling of very large image files

This update makes NameQuick significantly faster and more responsive. You‚Äôll especially notice the improvements when working with large folders, high-resolution images, or during batch processing operations. The app now adapts intelligently to your Mac‚Äôs performance, ensuring a smooth experience whether you‚Äôre on a MacBook Air or Mac Studio.

What you‚Äôll experience: - Much faster image loading and browsing - Smoother performance with large folders - Better memory usage and system responsiveness - More polished animations and visual feedback
